description: Monitor DLL/PE file events, specifically creation of these binary files as well as the loading of DLLs into processes. Look for DLLs that are not recognized or not normally loaded into a process. Note: This looks for unsigned images that may be loaded by regsvr32, while attempting to eliminate false positives stemming from Windows/Program Files binaries. Analytic 5 - Loading Unsigned Images (source="*WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode="7") (Image="C:\\Windows\\System32\\regsvr32.exe" OR Image="C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\regsvr32.exe") Signed=false ImageLoaded!="C:\\Program Files*" ImageLoaded!="C:\\Windows\\*"|stats values(ComputerName) as "Computer Name" count(ImageLoaded) as ImageLoadedCount by ImageLoaded
